task.name: Modularization
task.description: Seperation of portage's main body of functions and data into distinct, independent sections.

milestone.description: Eliminate global variables within portage internals.
Migrate all dependency resolution code out of the 'emerge' interface.
Create a generic API that will start consistent as portage's internal functions are moved across modules. Similar to the concent of portageq.
Migrate utility and helper functions into a seperate module.
Organize remaining code into independent modules.
Modularize and template classes that can be made into pluggable interfaces. Generally/Initially limited to IO classes.
Create a templated class of path and data information. Implements pathspec at the internal level.
Integrate path and data class into merging-related code. Finalize pathspec integration.
Create/Rewrite codeblocks in an object oriented style. Accessors and Mutators will be implemented to limit external changes (along with the API).
